title: Did you find what you were looking for on this webpage?
queryAffirmative: Do you have anything else to tell us?
queryNegative: Please tell us what you were looking for.
queryDescription: We will use this information to improve the site.

reportMessage.text: If you need to report child abuse, any other kind of abuse, or need urgent assistance, please click here.

helperText.message: Do not include sensetive information, such as Social Security or bank account numbers.

noResponseMessage: Your feedback will not receive a response.
noResponseDescription: This form only gathers feedback about the website.
